verses.verse: Now in the twenty <WH6242> and fourth <WH702> day <WH3117> of this month <WH2320> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> were assembled <WH622> with fasting <WH6685>, and with sackcloth <WH8242>, and earth upon them <WH127>.

And the seed <WH2233> of Israel <WH3478> separated <WH914> themselves from all foreigners <WH1121>, and stood <WH5975> and confessed <WH3034> their sins <WH2403>, and the iniquities <WH5771> of their fathers <WH1>.

And they stood up <WH6965> in their place <WH5977>, and read <WH7121> in the book <WH5612> of the law <WH8451> of Jehovah <WH3068> their God <WH430> a fourth part <WH7243> of the day <WH3117>; and another fourth part <WH7243> they confessed <WH3034>, and worshipped <WH7812> Jehovah <WH3068> their God <WH430>.

Then stood up <WH6965> upon the stairs <WH4608> of the Levites <WH3881>, Jeshua <WH3442>, and Bani <WH1137>, Kadmiel <WH6934>, Shebaniah <WH7645>, Bunni <WH1138>, Sherebiah <WH8274>, Bani <WH1137>, and Chenani <WH3662>, and cried <WH2199> with a loud <WH1419> voice <WH6963> unto Jehovah <WH3068> their God <WH430>.

Then the Levites <WH3881>, Jeshua <WH3442>, and Kadmiel <WH6934>, Bani <WH1137>, Hashabneiah <WH2813>, Sherebiah <WH8274>, Hodiah <WH1941>, Shebaniah <WH7645>, and Pethahiah <WH6611>, said <WH559>, Stand up <WH6965> and bless <WH1288> Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430> from everlasting <WH5769> to everlasting <WH5769>; and blessed <WH1288> be thy glorious <WH3519> name <WH8034>, which is exalted <WH7311> above all blessing <WH1293> and praise <WH8416>.

Thou art Jehovah <WH3068>, even thou alone <WH6213>; thou hast made heaven <WH8064>, the heaven <WH8064> of heavens <WH8064>, with all their host <WH6635>, the earth <WH776> and all things that are thereon <WH3220>, the seas and all that is in them <WH2421>, and thou preservest them all <WH6635>; and the host of heaven <WH8064> worshippeth thee <WH7812>.

Thou art Jehovah <WH3068> the God <WH430>, who didst choose <WH977> Abram <WH87>, and broughtest him forth <WH3318> out of Ur <WH218> of the Chaldees <WH3778>, and gavest <WH7760> him the name <WH8034> of Abraham <WH85>,

and foundest <WH4672> his heart <WH3824> faithful <WH539> before <WH6440> thee <WH3772>, and madest a covenant <WH1285> with him to give <WH5414> the land <WH776> of the Canaanite <WH3669>, the Hittite <WH2850>, the Amorite <WH567>, and the Perizzite <WH6522>, and the Jebusite <WH2983>, and the Girgashite <WH1622>, to give <WH5414> it unto his seed <WH2233>, and hast performed <WH6965> thy words <WH1697>; for thou art righteous <WH6662>.
And thou sawest <WH7200> the affliction <WH6040> of our fathers <WH1> in Egypt <WH4714>, and heardest <WH8085> their cry <WH2201> by the Red <WH5488> Sea <WH3220>,

and showedst <WH5414> signs <WH226> and wonders <WH4159> upon Pharaoh <WH6547>, and on all his servants <WH5650>, and on all the people <WH5971> of his land <WH776>; for thou knewest <WH3045> that they dealt proudly <WH2102> against them <WH6213>, and didst get thee a name <WH8034>, as it is this day <WH3117>.

And thou didst divide <WH1234> the sea <WH3220> before <WH6440> them <WH5674>, so that they went through the midst <WH8432> of the sea <WH3220> on the dry land <WH3004>; and their pursuers <WH7291> thou didst cast <WH7993> into the depths <WH4688>, as a stone <WH68> into the mighty <WH5794> waters <WH4325>.

Moreover in a pillar <WH5982> of cloud <WH6051> thou leddest <WH5148> them by day <WH3119>; and in a pillar <WH5982> of fire <WH784> by night <WH3915>, to give them light <WH215> in the way <WH1870> wherein they should go <WH3212>.

Thou camest down <WH3381> also upon mount <WH2022> Sinai <WH5514>, and spakest <WH1696> with them from heaven <WH8064>, and gavest <WH5414> them right <WH3477> ordinances <WH4941> and true <WH571> laws <WH8451>, good <WH2896> statutes <WH2706> and commandments <WH4687>,

and madest known <WH3045> unto them thy holy <WH6944> sabbath <WH7676>, and commandedst <WH6680> them commandments <WH4687>, and statutes <WH2706>, and a law <WH8451>, by <WH3027> Moses <WH4872> thy servant <WH5650>,

and gavest <WH5414> them bread <WH3899> from heaven <WH8064> for their hunger <WH7458>, and broughtest forth <WH3318> water <WH4325> for them out of the rock <WH5553> for their thirst <WH6772>, and commandedst <WH559> them that they should go in <WH935> to possess <WH3423> the land <WH776> which thou hadst sworn <WH3027> to give them <WH5414>.
But they and our fathers <WH1> dealt proudly <WH2102> and hardened <WH7185> their neck <WH6203>, and hearkened <WH8085> not to thy commandments <WH4687>,

and refused <WH3985> to obey <WH8085>, neither were mindful <WH2142> of thy wonders <WH6381> that thou didst <WH6213> among them <WH7185>, but hardened their neck <WH6203>, and in their rebellion <WH4805> appointed <WH5414> a captain <WH7218> to return <WH7725> to their bondage <WH5659>. But thou art a God <WH433> ready to pardon <WH5547>, gracious <WH2587> and merciful <WH7349>, slow <WH750> to anger <WH639>, and abundant <WH7227> in lovingkindness <WH2617>, and forsookest them not <WH5800>.

Yea <WH6213>, when they had made them a molten <WH4541> calf <WH5695>, and said <WH559>, This is thy God <WH430> that brought thee up <WH5927> out of Egypt <WH4714>, and had wrought <WH6213> great <WH1419> provocations <WH5007>;

yet thou in thy manifold <WH7227> mercies <WH7356> forsookest <WH5800> them not in the wilderness <WH4057>: the pillar <WH5982> of cloud <WH6051> departed <WH5493> not from over them by day <WH3119>, to lead <WH5148> them in the way <WH1870>; neither the pillar <WH5982> of fire <WH784> by night <WH3915>, to show them light <WH215>, and the way <WH1870> wherein they should go <WH3212>.

Thou gavest <WH5414> also thy good <WH2896> Spirit <WH7307> to instruct <WH7919> them <WH4513>, and withheldest not thy manna <WH4478> from their mouth <WH6310>, and gavest <WH5414> them water <WH4325> for their thirst <WH6772>.

Yea <WH705>, forty years <WH8141> didst thou sustain <WH3557> them in the wilderness <WH4057>, and they lacked <WH2637> nothing <WH8008>; their clothes waxed not old <WH1086>, and their feet <WH7272> swelled not <WH1216>.

Moreover thou gavest <WH5414> them kingdoms <WH4467> and peoples <WH5971>, which thou didst allot <WH2505> after their portions <WH6285>: so they possessed <WH3423> the land <WH776> of Sihon <WH5511>, even the land <WH776> of the king <WH4428> of Heshbon <WH2809>, and the land <WH776> of Og <WH5747> king <WH4428> of Bashan <WH1316>.

Their children <WH1121> also multipliedst <WH7235> thou as the stars <WH3556> of heaven <WH8064>, and broughtest <WH935> them into the land <WH776> concerning which thou didst say <WH559> to their fathers <WH1>, that they should go in <WH935> to possess it <WH3423>.

So the children <WH1121> went in <WH935> and possessed <WH3423> the land <WH776>, and thou subduedst <WH3665> before <WH6440> them the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776>, the Canaanites <WH3669>, and gavest <WH5414> them into their hands <WH3027>, with their kings <WH4428>, and the peoples <WH5971> of the land <WH776>, that they might do <WH6213> with them as they would <WH7522>.

And they took <WH3920> fortified <WH1219> cities <WH5892>, and a fat <WH8082> land <WH127>, and possessed <WH3423> houses <WH1004> full <WH4392> of all good things <WH2898>, cisterns <WH953> hewn <WH2672> out <WH3754>, vineyards, and oliveyards <WH2132>, and fruit <WH3978> - trees <WH6086> in abundance <WH7230>: so they did eat <WH398>, and were filled <WH7646>, and became fat <WH8080>, and delighted <WH5727> themselves in thy great <WH1419> goodness <WH2898>.

Nevertheless they were disobedient <WH4784>, and rebelled <WH4775> against thee <WH7993>, and cast thy law <WH8451> behind <WH310> their back <WH1458>, and slew <WH2026> thy prophets <WH5030> that testified <WH5749> against them to turn <WH7725> them again unto thee <WH6213>, and they wrought great <WH1419> provocations <WH5007>.

Therefore thou deliveredst <WH5414> them into the hand <WH3027> of their adversaries <WH6862>, who distressed <WH6887> them <WH6256>: and in the time of their trouble <WH6869>, when they cried <WH6817> unto thee <WH8085>, thou heardest from heaven <WH8064>; and according to thy manifold <WH7227> mercies <WH7356> thou gavest <WH5414> them saviours <WH3467> who saved <WH3467> them out of the hand <WH3027> of their adversaries <WH6862>.

But after they had rest <WH5117>, they did <WH6213> evil <WH7451> again <WH7725> before <WH6440> thee <WH5800>; therefore leftest thou them in the hand <WH3027> of their enemies <WH341>, so that they had the dominion <WH7287> over them <WH7725>: yet when they returned, and cried <WH2199> unto thee <WH8085>, thou heardest from heaven <WH8064>; and many <WH7227> times <WH6256> didst thou deliver <WH5337> them according to thy mercies <WH7356>,

and testifiedst <WH5749> against them <WH7725>, that thou mightest bring them again unto thy law <WH8451>. Yet they dealt proudly <WH2102>, and hearkened <WH8085> not unto thy commandments <WH4687>, but sinned <WH2398> against thine ordinances <WH4941>, (which if a man <WH120> do <WH6213>, he shall live <WH2421> in them <WH5414>), and withdrew the shoulder <WH3802>, and hardened <WH7185> their neck <WH6203>, and would not hear <WH8085>.

Yet many <WH7227> years <WH8141> didst thou bear with them <WH5749>, and testifiedst against them by thy Spirit <WH7307> through <WH3027> thy prophets <WH5030>: yet would they not give <WH5414> ear <WH238>: therefore gavest <WH5414> thou them into the hand <WH3027> of the peoples <WH5971> of the lands <WH776>.

Nevertheless in thy manifold <WH7227> mercies <WH7356> thou didst <WH6213> not make a full end <WH3617> of them <WH5800>, nor forsake them <WH2587>; for thou art a gracious and merciful <WH7349> God <WH410>.

Now therefore <WH430>, our God, the great <WH1419>, the mighty <WH1368>, and the terrible <WH3372> God <WH410>, who keepest <WH8104> covenant <WH1285> and lovingkindness <WH2617>, let not all the travail <WH8513> seem little <WH4591> before <WH6440> thee <WH4672>, that hath come upon us <WH4428>, on our kings, on our princes <WH8269>, and on our priests <WH3548>, and on our prophets <WH5030>, and on our fathers <WH1>, and on all thy people <WH5971>, since the time <WH3117> of the kings <WH4428> of Assyria <WH804> unto this day <WH3117>.
Howbeit thou art just <WH6662> in all that is come <WH935> upon us <WH6213>; for thou hast dealt truly <WH6213>, but we have done wickedly <WH7561>;

neither have our kings <WH4428>, our princes <WH8269>, our priests <WH3548>, nor our fathers <WH1>, kept <WH6213> thy law <WH8451>, nor hearkened <WH7181> unto thy commandments <WH4687> and thy testimonies <WH5715> wherewith thou didst testify against them <WH5749>.

For they have not served <WH5647> thee in their kingdom <WH4438>, and in thy great <WH7227> goodness <WH2898> that thou gavest <WH5414> them <WH7342>, and in the large and fat <WH8082> land <WH776> which thou gavest <WH5414> before <WH6440> them <WH7725>, neither turned they from their wicked <WH7451> works <WH4611>.

Behold <WH5650>, we are servants this day <WH3117>, and as for the land <WH776> that thou gavest <WH5414> unto our fathers <WH1> to eat <WH398> the fruit <WH6529> thereof and the good <WH2898> thereof <WH5650>, behold, we are servants in it.

And it yieldeth much <WH7235> increase <WH8393> unto the kings <WH4428> whom thou hast set <WH5414> over us because of our sins <WH2403>: also they have power <WH4910> over our bodies <WH1472>, and over our cattle <WH929>, at their pleasure <WH7522>, and we are in great <WH1419> distress <WH6869>.
And yet for all this we make <WH3772> a sure <WH548> covenant <WH3789>, and write it <WH8269>; and our princes, our Levites <WH3881>, and our priests <WH3548>, seal unto it <WH2856>.
